comment: ExactlySab ko sab languages k word nahi pata hote yaarUnhone publically sorry bhi bolaKya , aap k sanskar "maafi" dena nahi sikhate?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / exact)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (s / string-entity
                              :value "Nahi"))
                  :ARG2 (l / language
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Sab")))
            :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (w2 / word
                        :mod (s2 / string-entity
                              :value "nahi"))
                  :ARG2 (h / here))
            :op3 (b3 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (w3 / word
                        :mod s2)
                  :ARG2 h))
      :op4 (s3 / say-01
            :ARG1 (s4 / sorry-01
                  :ARG1-of (p / public-02))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Bhi"
                        :op2 "bolaKya")))
      :op5 (b4 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s5 / string-entity
                  :value "maafi")
            :ARG2 h)
      :op6 (b5 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 w3
            :ARG2 h)
      :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
